channel.title: Jekyll on Hello. I'm Dean Clatworthy
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Hello. I'm Dean Clatworthy

item.title: Migrating Jekyll to Hugo - my experience
item.description: For those that haven’t yet heard about it Hugo is a lightning-fast, and powerful static generator built using golang. For the last couple of years I’ve used Jekyll to build this site, but even with this few pages & posts Jekyll takes between 5-10 seconds to generate my tiny site. For those of you currently running Jekyll before you decide to switch, make sure first of all that you configure it correctly first, specifically making sure you only include/exclude relevent files from your build process.
